page.title: 16DAISYMERE FARM
page.content: Daisymere Farm is in the north west quarter of our block.It is{100 {years old.}The farm has{22 fields }and covers{110 acres.}The farm is a{dairy {farm.}It produces milk and keeps 82 cows, 32 sheep and 54 lambs.In winter,the cows feed on sileage, which is pickled grass. The farm has{automatic machines} to milk the cows as well as 4 tractors, 1 buck rake and 1 sileage cutter. Daisymere Farm looks very old: at one time{it might have been a {small hamlet.}Mr.Beswick, the farmer, says he enjoys his work. He gets up at 5 o'clock in the morning, and works until 7 o'clock at night. {The last time he went away for a {holiday was in 1939.}
